name: Drone Fighter
description:
Drone Fighter is a learning project based on the tutorials by [Gamecraftschool]. A simple space shooter game with a few surprises.

For more information on indie game development for beginners, please visit https://www.gamecraft.hu/ .

Please let me know if you enjoyed the game!

Controls

WASDMoveup, down, right, leftMoveleft mouse buttonshootright mouse buttonplace mineESC, Space, Ppause

Enemies

Enemies range for 3 different levels, and 5 colors. Each color has a chance to trigger a special effect against the player.

The more drones you kill, the harder it becomes to defeat them.

You can play up to 100 levels!

Pickups

You can upgrade or repair your damaged battleship with the pickups, if defeated enemies drop them. Or you can get a helper in higher levels, who fights on your side!

Your helper is capable of learning, and gets stronger each time it gets defeated.

Mine

You have a special weapon. The more you use it, the stronger it gets.
